nodes.bodyText:
I think it would be clearer to have a more complete phrase, without compromising the simplicity of the bulleted list. For example:

  
    
  
    

  
  This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            Required build-in roles:
          
          
            
            If the {es} {security-features} are enabled, you must have the following built-in roles or equivalent privileges:
          
      
    
    
  

If you accept this change, it would apply to all other updated files too.  And we can synch the formatting of the other ML APIs too (in a separate PR).
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -21,8 +21,12 @@ experimental[]
 [[ml-delete-dfanalytics-prereq]]
 ==== {api-prereq-title}
 
-* You must have `machine_learning_admin` built-in role to use this API. For more
-information, see <<security-privileges>> and <<built-in-roles>>.
+Required build-in roles:

nodes.bodyText:
@lcawl Thanks, I accepted the change and applied it to the rest of the files in the following manner:
If the API requires only built-in roles:
If the {es} {security-features} are enabled, you must have the following built-in roles or equivalent privileges:

(bulleted list of built-in roles)

If the API requires only privileges:
If the {es} {security-features} are enabled, you must have the following privileges:

(bulleted list of privileges)

If the API requires both build-in roles and privileges:
If the {es} {security-features} are enabled, you must have the following built-in roles and privileges:


(bulleted list of build-in roles)


(bulleted list of privileges)
